mean_cn: adj. 中世纪的，中古（时代）的
mean_en: of or relating to the Middle Ages :of or relating to the period of European history from about A.D. 500 to about 1500
word_etyma: medi中间+ev年龄，时代+al...的→中间时代的→medieval 中世纪的
sentence: Castles and knights were symbols of the medieval times.
sentence_trans: 城堡和骑士是中世纪的象征。
